agentCard.name: Mix And Match Llm Function Agent
agentCard.description: Advanced LLM-powered system that automatically generates new plugs and pipes by intelligently combining existing plugin capabilities based on natural language requirements. Core intelligence system for PlugPipe's universal integration capabilities.
